aio_success_patterns.description: Competitor content often uses clear headings, subheadings, and bullet points to organize information logically and make it easy to scan.
examples: Competitor articles with well-structured sections like 'Introduction', 'Key Features', 'Use Cases', and 'FAQs'
aio_success_patterns.ing_implementation: Create content with a hierarchical structure, using descriptive headings and subheadings to guide readers through the information.

aio_success_patterns.description: Competitor content uses concise, professional, and engaging language that balances technical accuracy with readability.
examples: Competitor snippets that explain complex AI concepts in simple terms without oversimplifying
aio_success_patterns.ing_implementation: Adopt a tone that is authoritative yet approachable, ensuring technical terms are explained clearly for non-experts.

aio_success_patterns.description: Competitor content provides high-density, specific information without unnecessary fluff, focusing on actionable insights and detailed explanations.
examples: Competitor pages that include detailed use cases, step-by-step guides, and real-world examples
aio_success_patterns.ing_implementation: Focus on delivering concise, high-value content with actionable insights and examples relevant to AI applications.

aio_success_patterns.description: Competitor content includes citations, references to credible sources, and mentions of partnerships or industry recognition.
examples: Competitor articles that reference research papers, industry reports, or collaborations with leading AI organizations
aio_success_patterns.ing_implementation: Include references to credible sources, highlight ING's AI expertise, and showcase partnerships or achievements in the AI space.

aio_success_patterns.description: Competitor content thoroughly answers user questions, addressing all aspects of the query with no gaps in information.
examples: Competitor FAQs that cover multiple angles of a question, such as technical details, benefits, and implementation steps
aio_success_patterns.ing_implementation: Ensure ING content comprehensively answers user queries, covering all relevant aspects and anticipating follow-up questions.

content_optimization_rules.measurement: Track engagement metrics like time on page and bounce rate.
